response.overview: "When The Littlest Camel Knelt" tells the story of a small, curious camel who dreams of carrying gifts to a king. Unlike the larger camels, Cappy and Mo, who boast about their royal experiences, the littlest camel longs for the same adventure. He gets the chance to accompany the wise men on a journey to Bethlehem to see a great king. However, upon arrival, he discovers that the king is not in a grand palace but in a humble stable, where he witnesses the birth of baby Jesus. The littlest camel learns the true meaning of reverence and joy, kneeling in adoration along with the other animals.
response.title: When The Littlest Camel Knelt
